Common
Agency
Patterns

For creating websites and digital products for The Mayor's Office for Economic Opportunity. The NYCO Patterns provide simple and flexible CSS and JavaScript based components and utilities for building UI's quickly and easily. Ideally suited for internal or external marketing websites, custom digital applications, stand-alone reports, documentation, and dashboards.

Browse the Patterns

v2.5.1

Installation

The NYCO Patterns are built on the NYCO Patterns Framework and can be installed using documentation in the Framework's repository.

Read the Documentation

The Mayor's Office for Economic Opportunity
Home GitHub Repository NYCO Patterns Framework NYCO Opportunity on GitHub

NYC Opportunity is the New York City Mayor's Office for Economic Opportunity. We are committed to sharing open source software that we use in our products. Feel free to ask questions and share feedback. Follow @nycopportunity on Twitter, Facebook, Medium, and Github.
